title: Arcadian Gates
description: Only ten years ago, the entire nation was struck by a chemical weapon which destroyed most peopleâ€™s memories. Akiry, a young woman who makes her way smuggling amongst the lower caste of the rebuilt country, is haunted by dreams of a daughter she otherwise does not remember.As civil war erupts in the city around her, she takes the last chance she has to find the truth about her daughter and her past.
author: T.A. Wardrope
